module.name: todo/todo

attribute.description: [Optional] Indicates the URL of a document where to store the ToDo list contents. Leave empty to use default storage.
attribute.name: url

module.description: This module displays a to-do list, you can add, edit, delete and set as complete/uncomplete items on the list. All items are stored on an xml document, so that multiple ToDo modules can coexist on a page.
